name: Lorenwetry
message:
We are the most popular BOARDING film ACTING CAMP in the world. 
 
We have been inviting teen/young adult actors to Los Angeles for the past 
 
22 years to experience hands-on film work in preparation to become competitive film actors. 
 
 
 
The Ultimate Film Actors Camp OR The Actors Launching Pad are two overnight programs 
 
that have space in their second sessions. 
 
Review https://www.youngactorscamp.com an 11 to 22 year old who dreams of becoming a working film actor! 
 
 
Second, we'd love to use your company as a focus subject for our commercial workshop. It is cast by a top casting director and a full film production team who will work to provide a usable clip. The sponsor fee is only $400 which pays for a writer working with you as well as a few edits 
 
Reply to receive more information.
